pullRequest.title: Nexmark: fix typos and clean unused options
pullRequest.bodyText:
This removes some unused options from launcher, fixes the justModelResultRate mode by fixing the formatting string, uses the right name for the SessionSideInputJoin and renames the argument in one launcher option, just for consistency.
The removal of the unused options could break some test setups somewhere, but I see this as a minimal concern. It will not affect any production pipelines and the amount of people regularly running the NEXMark benchmark with old unused options. Alternative is to use the @Hidden annotation and note in the docstrings that they are not in use.

Thank you for your contribution! Follow this checklist to help us incorporate your contribution quickly and easily:

 Choose reviewer(s) and mention them in a comment (R: @username).
 Format the pull request title like [BEAM-XXX] Fixes bug in ApproximateQuantiles, where you replace BEAM-XXX with the appropriate JIRA issue, if applicable. This will automatically link the pull request to the issue.
 Update CHANGES.md with noteworthy changes.
 If this contribution is large, please file an Apache Individual Contributor License Agreement.

See the Contributor Guide for more tips on how to make review process smoother.

commit.message:
Nexmark: fix typos and clean unused options

This removes some unused options from launcher, fixes the
justModelResultRate mode by fixing the formatting string, uses the right
name for the SessionSideInputJoin and renames the argument in one
launcher option, just for consistency.
